% Supply Base Report Entity Table
% Auto-generated from JSON schema

\begin{entitytable}{Supply Base Report}
\textbf{\field{organizationId}} & string (pattern) & Foreign key to Organization entity that prepared this report \\
\textbf{\field{preparationDate}} & string (date) & Preparationdate field value \\
\textbf{\field{sbrId}} & string (pattern) & Unique identifier for the sbr \\
\field{publicationUrl} & string (uri) & Publicationurl field value \\
\field{reportGeographicDataId} & string (pattern) & Foreign key to GeographicData entity for report coverage area \\
\field{sourcingPractices} & string & Sourcingpractices field value \\
\field{supplyBaseIds} & array<string> & Array of SupplyBase IDs that this report covers \\
\field{supplyBaseSummary} & string & Supplybasesummary field value \\
\field{sustainabilityMeasures} & string & Sustainabilitymeasures field value \\
\end{entitytable}
